name: .MPT File Extension
summary: Learn about .MPT files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open and edit an MPT template with Microsoft Project in Windows. You can also open an MPT file with third-party applications, such as MOOS Project Viewer and MPXJ.
Various applications, including Microsoft Project and MPXJ, can convert MPT files to other formats.
For example, Microsoft Project can convert MPT files to many file types, including the following formats when you select File â†’ Save As:
